full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
### 280 Slater Office Seating 17th and 18th Floors

#### Solicitation Information

* Reference number: WS4275297771-Doc4276926020
* Amendment number: 3
* Solicitation number: WS4275297771

#### Tender Notice

* Publication date: October 26, 2023
* Tender closing date: November 21, 2023, 14:00 EST
* Tender status: Expiry (closed to new submissions)

#### Contract Level Information

* Expected contract start date: December 11, 2023
* Expected contract end date: Not specified (open-ended contract)

#### Procurement Details

* Contract category: Goods and Services (GD)
* Procurement method: Competitive open bidding
* Pre-qualification: Not required
* Trade agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of opportunity: None
* Regions of delivery: National Capital Region (NCR)

#### Bidder Requirements

* Bidder registration: Required
* Contact information:
	+ Name: King Quan
	+ Email: [king.quan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:king.quan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### Tender Documents and Specifications

* Notice URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17833698?extsite=MTc4MzM2OThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
* Tender description: Please submit all required supporting documentation and bids by November 21, 2023, 14:00 EST. Any bids submitted after this time will be considered non-responsive.

Please note that the contractor has indicated that the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline has been modified. Bidders are requested to disregard the original response deadline and instead, adhere to the new deadline above. Any bids submitted after the specified deadline will be considered non-responsive.

[Please note the contractor changed the response deadline to 14h00. Bids responded to before this time will be reviewed.]
